caption.p: Vertically averaged annual- and zonal-mean meridional streamfunction (700 to 300 hPa with mass weighting) in the historical simulation (1985–2004) for the CNRM-CM5 model. Features of the ITCZ structure are indicated: location ( ϕ ITCZ), width ( W ITCZ), total mass transport (Ψ ITCZ), and the northern and southern edges ( ϕ N and ϕ S). The ITCZ strength is defined as ω ITCZ = − gΨ ITCZ/ A ITCZ, where the ITCZ area is given by Eq. 3
